cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Travel Diffuser is the perfect product when you are on the go, or when you need the instant pick me up. Fitting nicely into your pocket, purse, the diffuser is a whole essential oils aromatherapy diffuser. A deep inhale through both nostrils: - Supports physical energy and stamina* - Provides a quick energy boost* - Supports mental focus and clarity* For best results, use with Redd Remedies True Energy Herbal Supplement. *Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
